name: IMDB - Dark Theme (November 2010 EDIT)
description:
NOTE: Original made by zigboom.
To zigboom: If you want this to be deleted, just notify me, and I will Delete it right away.

IMDB styled in dark grays.

Based on the style: IMDB - Dark grey improved by cupcake.
Many tweaks and fixes.
Fully redesigned in all areas.
Clean and easy on the eyes.

Comments are welcome,
enjoY!
